content: Let me just say up front, last time I used XYZ, it was a disaster. The tech was late, nobody called me, and the job wasn't done right. What’s going to be different this time?

Thank you for sharing your experience. I’m very sorry to hear things didn’t go as expected last time. My goal today is to make this process as smooth and convenient as possible for you. Could I please have your name so I can get things started and ensure you get the attention you deserve?
Jim. But last time, I never got any honest updates. I want better communication.

Thank you, Jim. I understand how important good communication is. I’ll make sure you receive regular updates from start to finish this time. Could you please provide the address where you need service?
Thank you, Jim. Let me quickly confirm that 127 Gladeview Drive is in our service area.
We can help you at 127 Gladeview Drive. Could you tell me a little more about the HVAC issue you're facing?
The AC just isn’t cooling like it should. And NO, it’s not the filter. I check that all the time. Just book someone who actually knows what they're doing.
Thanks for letting me know, Jim. We’ll make sure to send an experienced HVAC technician. What would be the best day and time for you to have someone out?
Let me check for the soonest available afternoon appointment for you.
We have an HVAC technician available today between 2–4 PM. Would you like to book that slot?
Yes, that’s fine. Please make sure they call before they arrive this time.
Absolutely, Jim. Your technician will call ahead before they arrive. I'm booking your appointment now for today between 2–4 PM.
